div1.head: Letter from Raul R. de Amaral to the Military Governor of Cuba, August 8, 1901

Washington, D.C.
August 8th, 1901.
Charge d'Affairs,
Brazilian Legation.
Acknowledges receipt of cable
stating that Dr. Felippe Caldas
withll be given assistance in his

August, 8th., 1901.
His Excellency
The Military Governor of Cuba.
Sir:
div1.p:
I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your
cablegram of the 7th. instant, kindly assuring me that Dr.
Felippe Caldas will have the privilege of your valuable
assistance in the pursuit of his scientific researches in
Havana.

With the expressions of my sincere appreciation for
your extreeme courtesy, I beg to remain, Sir,
div1.closer: Respectfully yours, Raul R. de Amaral Chargé d'Affaires of Brazil.
